8.text: In Russia, there is no Santa Claus, but instead...

9.text: Who wrote the famous Christmas carol 'From Heaven Above to Earth I Come'?
9.explanation: Martin Luther wrote the Christmas carol 'From Heaven Above to Earth I Come' in Wittenberg in 1535 for his children.

13.text: How many doors does the Advent calendar in Iceland have?
13.explanation: In Iceland, the Advent calendar has only 13 doors because instead of Santa Claus, the 13 Christmas elves bring gifts. The calendar starts on December 12.
